text: Bonanza is an unincorporated community in Caldwell County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Bonanza was established in 1881, and remained in operation until 1903. Bonanza is a name derived from the Spanish language. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Caldwell County, Missouri Category:1881 establishments in Missouri Category:Populated places established in 1881 Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Bonanza, Missouri
